Package net.xuset.objectIO.connections

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionI
    Interface that outlines operations for sending and receiving messages across various mediums.
    HubI<T extends ConnectionI>
    A container interface for ConnectionI objects.
    StreamConI
    An extension of ConnectionI, this interface outlines methods that could by useful for connections that are backed by streams.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Basic, abstract implementation of ConnectionI.
    ConnectionHub<T extends ConnectionI>
    A basic implementation of HubI.
    FileCon
    Connection that can be used to send and receive MarkupMsg to and from a file.
    StreamCon
    StreamCon is implementation of ConnectionI that is backed by streams.
    StreamConReader
    This class continually monitors the input stream for new data.
